section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Industry Group For Responsible Gambling (IGRG) 
http://igrg.org.uk/wp/home/
goals__remit:
The Bingo Association is the trade body for bingo operators in Great Britain, licensed under The Gambling Act 2005. 
 
The Association's aim is to promote and develop the interests of ALL licensed bingo operators in Great Britain and represent the sector on all key matters affecting the industry.
relevant_communication: Bingo Life Magazine - available as hard copy and online.
